name: Slime Hero (TeamWetRice)
description:
For the Ontario Tech U GDSU 2020 Fall Game Jam;

Play through a four level demo of the game. Control Slim the Slime with the W, A and D keys, for walking and jumping. Stick to and Climb up walls, Bounce along the ground, Avoid Spikes and Humans, and Get your Friends their Stuff BACK! The theme of our game jam was Lost + Found, and we here at Team Wet Rice hope you enjoy.
